name: Lord of empires
description:
Lord of Empires is a strategy game whose essence is to control the troops that you can send to capture the enemy.
The game map consists of 4 different settlements, in which there are 4 teams. Each building generates warriors that can be moved and sent to capture buildings.
Management is carried out using the mouse. In order to send warriors, hold down the button on the tower and pull it to the building you need.
The goal of the game is to capture all the towers and prevent the enemy from doing the same.
Peculiarities:
- Addictive gameplay;
- Nice graphics;
- Dynamically changing weather.
